channel.title: Downloads Cache Every Time I Start Client
channel.description: I have a 317 rsps, and every single time I open my client, it starts downloading the cache. I have the cache uploaded to dropbox and it linked into the client right. I also took the cache folder and put it in my C:\ and in my user folder, and it still keeps trying to download the cache every time. How do I fix this?
